text: Syed Masud Reza was a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Barisal-6. ==Career== Reza was elected to parliament from Barisal-6 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1996. ==Death== Reza died in 2013. His daughter, Ambareen Reza, is a businesswoman and founding director of Food Panda Bangladesh. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:2013 deaths Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Syed Masud Reza
